review_blob:
Pours a cloudy dark gold with a bit of effervescence. Not too sweet. Good flavor and just a hint of carbonation. Nice for sitting on the patio on a spring day. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Fox Barrel Pear Naked Organic Perry

review_blob:
Nice strawberry aroma, pinkish color, starts off with a nice unique flavor of strawberries and honey and maybe molasses? A bit of a weird finish, though, almost like soda water. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
